titles.title: Chisholm and Great Western Cattle Trails Act of 2005

To amend the National Trails System Act to designate the Chisholm Trail and Great Western Trail historic cattle-drive trails for study and for potential addition to the National Trails System, and for other purposes.

bill.summary: 6/17/2005--Introduced. Chisholm and Great Western Cattle Trails Act of 2005 - Amends the National Trails System Act to direct the Secretary of the Interior to conduct separate studies to determine the feasibility and suitability of designation of: (1) at least one of the routes commonly known as the Chisholm Trail as components of the Chisholm Trail National Historic Trail; and (2) at least one of the routes commonly known as the Great Western Trail as components of the Great Western Trail National Historic Trail.
